title: Remove Abhijit Da's teacher profile image

requirements.text: Remove Abhijit Da's teacher profile image from the Teachers component (frontend/src/components/Teachers.tsx), replacing it with a placeholder avatar or initials-based fallback while preserving all text content including name, classes taught (Class 4 – Class 10), subject (Mathematics), experience (5 Years), and teaching focus
acceptanceCriteria: Abhijit Da's profile card in the Teachers component displays a placeholder avatar or initials fallback instead of an image
All text content for Abhijit Da remains visible: name, classes, subject, experience, and teaching focus
The card layout and styling remain consistent with other teacher profiles

requirements.text: Remove Abhijit Da's teacher profile image from the TeachersNotes component (frontend/src/components/TeachersNotes.tsx) for the 'Class 4 – 10' notes card, replacing it with a placeholder avatar or initials-based fallback while preserving all teacher information and notes features
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Class 4 – 10' notes card in the TeachersNotes component displays a placeholder avatar or initials fallback instead of an image
All teacher information remains visible: Abhijit (Abhi) Da, Mathematics, 5 Years experience
All notes features and download functionality remain intact
The card maintains visual consistency with other notes cards

constraints: Do not modify any files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve all text content, layout structure, and styling consistency in both Teachers and TeachersNotes components
Maintain bilingual support for all existing content
nonGoals: Do not remove Abhijit Da's profile data or text content
Do not modify other teacher profiles (Sonali Ma'am, Santanu Sir)
Do not change the component structure or layout grid
